original: #### 30 Days Money Back Guarantee Get a full refund if the product does not meet your expectations! No questions, No hassle. ## Frequently Asked Questions Can I use Bot Penguin for free? Yes, Bot Penguin’s baby plan is free forever. We don't hold you back in any way. What channels does the King plan include? Bot Penguin's King Plan allows you to create chatbot for websites, Whats App, Facebook, Telegram, and Microsoft Teams. You can also create conversational landing pages and live chat widgets. Can I get Demo of Bot Penguin’s chatbot platform? Yes, you can book a demo using our chatbot from the bottom-right corner or fill contact us & we will arrange it for you. What happens when I cross the response limit? Bot Penguin will send a message limit reminder when 90% of the messages are used. After the limit is exhausted completely, you must upgrade your current plan. Until then, your bots will not be able to bring leads and talk to your customers until you upgrade. How do I make the
summary: Bot Penguin's King Plan allows you to create chatbot for websites, Whats App, Facebook, Telegram, and Microsoft Teams. You can also create conversational landing pages and live chat widgets. 30 Days Money Back Guarantee Get a full refund if the product does not meet your expectations.

original: payment? You can pay for Bot Penguin using Stripe or Razor Pay; both are secure, encrypted gateways. Security is our topmost priority. Does Bot Penguin offer any discount? Absolutely, you can get a sweeter deal, if you choose the yearly plan, you only have to pay for 10 months. Two months is on us. Also, we provide a 30% discount to nonprofit organizations. Can I cancel my subscription? If you feel Bot Penguin’s isn’t what you were looking for, you can cancel your subscriptions. No questions asked. The Penguin will miss you, though. What’s the lowest paid plan I can choose to launch my chatbot? The little plan is the base paid plan at $14.47 that includes 3000 messages, 3000 conversations, 5 Chatbots, 5 agents, & more. What is your refund policy? Get in touch with our friendly customer success manager who is handling your account, and they will make the process easy. Do you have a trial account? The baby plan is like a trial, but it does not restrict you like everyone else. There is
summary: You can pay for Bot Penguin using Stripe or Razor Pay; both are secure, encrypted gateways. If you feel Bot Penguin’s isn’t what you were looking for, you can cancel your subscriptions. The Penguin will miss you, though.

original: no time limit. Take all the time you want to, and size up when you are ready. Where can I get my Invoice? It will be sent to your email address; if you need anything specific, feel free to contact your customer success manager. Can I get custom tools integrated into Bot Penguin? Yes, our expert chatbot developers can assist you in integrating Bot Penguin with your existing tech stack. Do I have to pay for integrations? All the integrations are included in the plans. You don’t have pay extra for it. However, for custom integration you’ll be charged. Can I add Bot Penguin’s live chat to many websites at once? Yes you can add live chat to more than one site as you are allowed to create multiple chatbots and allowed to customize them uniquely. How many Chatbots can be created in King Plan? You can create unlimited chatbots for all platforms included in the king plan. How many chat agents can I include in the King plan? You can include 10 agents with the king plan. You can add more agents
summary: You can add live chat to more than one site as you are allowed to create multiple chatbots. You can create unlimited chatbots for all platforms included in the king plan. How many chat agents can I include in the King plan? You can include 10 agents with the king plans.

original: at additional charges. What is your markup on Meta prices? We do not charge anything on top of Meta conversations charges; you pay the Whats App conversations fee directly to Meta. Can you provide me with green-tick verification? Yes, we do. Once you get started with us, we'll get you through everything. Can I send bulk messages? Yes, they can be scheduled and targeted as per your strategy.
